title: Bison & Buffalo Quiz
description: Charge into this quiz about bison, buffalo, and other impressive bovines from around the world

questions.question: What is the main difference between a bison and a true buffalo?
options: Bison have a large shoulder hump and thick fur, buffalo do not
Buffalo are from North America, bison from Africa
